get.summary: Returns all available TaskProcessing task types
get.description:
Endpoint for ExApp usage without user context
This endpoint requires admin access

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

401.description: Current user is not logged in

403.description: Logged in account must be an admin

post.description:
Endpoint for ExApp usage without user context. Files cannot be referenced in this case.
This endpoint requires admin access

appId.description: ID of the app that will execute the task

customId.description: An arbitrary identifier for the task

webhookUri.description: URI to be requested when the task finishes

webhookMethod.description: Method used for the webhook request (HTTP:GET, HTTP:POST, HTTP:PUT, HTTP:DELETE or AppAPI:APP_ID:GET, AppAPI:APP_ID:POST...)

includeWatermark.description: Whether to include a watermark in the output file or not

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

401.description: Cannot schedule task because it references files in its input

403.description: Logged in account must be an admin

get.summary: Gets a task including status and result
get.description:
Endpoint for ExApp usage without user context
Tasks are removed 1 week after receiving their last update
This endpoint requires admin access

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the task

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

401.description: Current user is not logged in

403.description: Logged in account must be an admin

get.summary: Returns the contents of a file referenced in a task(ExApp route version)

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: The id of the task

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: The file id of the file to retrieve

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

401.description: Current user is not logged in

403.description: Logged in account must be an admin

post.summary: Upload a file so it can be referenced in a task result (ExApp route version)
post.description:
Use field 'file' for the file upload
This endpoint requires admin access

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: The id of the task

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

400.description: File upload failed or no file was uploaded

401.description: Current user is not logged in

403.description: Logged in account must be an admin

output.description: The resulting task output, files are represented by their IDs

errorMessage.description: An error message if the task failed

userFacingErrorMessage.description: An error message that will be shown to the user

get.summary: Returns the next n scheduled tasks for the specified set of taskTypes and providers The returned tasks are capped at ~50MiB

parameters.description: The ids of the providers

parameters.description: The ids of the task types

parameters.description: The number of tasks to return
